meanings.definition: To cause to feel great happiness or delight.
meanings.sent1: The surprise party was overjoying for Sarah.
meanings.sent2: She is overjoying at the news of her promotion.
meanings.sent3: The puppy's antics were overjoying to watch.
meanings.sent4: The colorful fireworks display overjoyed the entire town.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter filled the room, overjoying everyone present.

meanings.definition: To experience great happiness or delight.
meanings.sent1: After a long day at work, she was overjoying to relax on the couch.
meanings.sent2: The little girl was overjoying when she saw her favorite cartoon on TV.
meanings.sent3: The ice cream truck arriving just as the sun set was overjoying timing.
meanings.sent4: The warm hug from her best friend overjoyed her heart.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh flowers in the garden was overjoying on a sunny morning.
